page.title: 19THE SHOPS IN BAILIFF BRIDGE
page.content: The Co-op is a supermarket where you can get food, drinks and sweets. It is a very big shop. Next to the Co-op there is a small carpet shop. Besides that there is the Punchbowl Hotel. There is a hairdresser next to the pub. Across the road there is a newsagent. Bailiff Bridge Stores is similar to the Co-op. The greengrocers is a small shop next to Bailiff Bridge Stores. Next to the greengrocers there is a pet shop. The dentists is next to the pet shop and on the other side is another newsagents and post office.
